# Dependencies
/node_modules

# Build artifacts (if applicable, e.g., if using a bundler like Webpack/Vite)
/dist
/build
/.output
/.vercel

# Log files
*.log
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*

# Environment variables files (IMPORTANT!)
# Although we put keys directly in firebase-config.js for this example,
# normally you'd use a .env file locally and Vercel environment variables for deployment.
# ALWAYS ignore files containing secrets.
.env
.env*.local
*.env

# Operating system generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# IDE/Editor directories
.idea/
.vscode/
*.swp
*.swo
